# smsMode

**Instance Property**

Return the device’s SMS mode.

## Declaration

```swift
var smsMode: IOBluetoothSMSMode { get }
```

## Return Value

The SMS mode

## Discussion

Returns the device’s SMS mode. The values are described in “IOBluetoothSMSMode.”
title: smsMode
